title: Beyond Chatbots: The Architecture of Modern AI Agents
description: AI is evolving from simple chatbots to autonomous agents that can reason, plan, and execute complex tasks. This deep dive explores the core architectural patterns—like the ReAct loop, tool use, and memory—that power this new generation of AI.

title: Beyond robots.txt: A Developer's Guide to llms.txt and the Future of Search
description: A hands-on, practical guide for developers on llms.txt, the proposed new standard for guiding Large Language Models and shaping the future of AI-driven search.

const{Fragment:e,jsx:n,jsxs:a}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(s){const l={a:"a",button:"button",code:"code",em:"em",figure:"figure",h2:"h2",h3:"h3",h4:"h4",li:"li",ol:"ol",p:"p",path:"path",pre:"pre",rect:"rect",span:"span",strong:"strong",svg:"svg",ul:"ul",...s.components};return a(e,{children:[n(l.h2,{id:"the-problem",children:n(l.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#the-problem",children:"The Problem"})}),"
",a(l.p,{children:["For decades, ",n(l.code,{children:"robots.txt"}),' has been our primary tool for communicating with web crawlers. It’s a simple, effective contract: "Here’s where you can and cannot go." But this contract was designed for the web crawlers of yesterday, like Googlebot, which are built for indexing and ranking. Today, a new class of web citizen has arrived: the Large Language Model (LLM).']}),"
",a(l.p,{children:["LLMs don't just index content; they try to ",n(l.em,{children:"understand"})," it. When an AI agent browses your documentation, it isn't just following links. It's trying to learn how your API works. And it often fails spectacularly. Modern websites, with their complex JavaScript, dynamic content, and intricate navigation, are a minefield for an LLM. The result? Inaccurate summaries, nonsensical answers, and a frustrating experience for users of AI-powered search."]}),"
",n(l.p,{children:"We need a new contract. One designed not just to control access, but to provide guidance."}),"
",n(l.h2,{id:"core-concepts",children:n(l.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#core-concepts",children:"Core Concepts"})}),"

",a(l.p,{children:["Its purpose is not to restrict access like ",n(l.code,{children:"robots.txt"}),', but to provide a curated, structured guide for LLMs. Think of it less like a bouncer and more like a friendly concierge. It tells an LLM, "Welcome. You seem to be trying to understand my website. Forget the complex navigation and JavaScript. Here are the most important pages and a summary of what they contain."']}),"
",a(l.p,{children:["By providing a clear, token-efficient map, ",n(l.code,{children:"llms.txt"})," helps an AI quickly grasp the structure and purpose of your site, leading to more accurate and relevant responses."]}),"
